title: Aura Talks S2E9: COVID-19, A Wake-Up Call? Part I

contentBlocks.content: On todayâ€™s episode, Dan Be is joined by three brilliant Aurovilians, B, Vikram and Paulette, the latter of who is currently researching the impact of the COVID-19 outbreak on community life. After sharing their personal views on how the outbreak has affected individuals and units alike, the dynamic quattro highlight the silver linings of the global crisis. If you have been wondering whether crisis and disasters have a way of bringing people together and reviving the collective spirit, this is the perfect episode for you to tune in!  Happy Viewing~! As we always like to say on Aura Talks, ciao for now! Part II of this episode will be released next week! Stay tuned :)
